title: An Act enhancing municipal bonding efficacy

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Day of Stoneham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2257) of Michael S. Day for legislation to establish a special legislative commission to conduct an investigation and study of municipal bonding.  Municipalities and Regional Government.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

related_entities.name: committee on Municipalities and Regional Government

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 06/24/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in B-1
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

related_entities.name: the committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently
committee on Rules of the two branches, acting concurrently

actions.description: Discharged to the committee on House Rules
